section.name: Filterset
section.definition: The FilterSet or also FilterCube used in a microscope.

property.name: InventoryNo
property.definition: The inventory number of the FilterSet.

property.name: Owner
property.definition: The inventory number of the FilterSet.

property.name: ExcitationFilterModel
property.definition: The model of excitation filter.

property.name: ExcitationFilterManufacturer
property.definition: The Manufacturer providing the of the excitation filter.

property.name: ExcitationFilterWavelength
property.definition: The wavelength of the excitation filter.

property.name: ExcitationFilterLowerBound
property.definition: The lower bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the excitation filter.

property.name: ExcitationFilterUpperBound
property.definition: The upper bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the excitation filter.

property.name: ExcitationFilterRange
property.definition: The width of the transmitted wavelength range.

property.name: ExcitationFilterPassbandTransmission
property.definition: The transmission in the passband. Given in %.

property.name: EmissionFilterModel
property.definition: The model of excitation filter.

property.name: EmissionFilterManufacturer
property.definition: The Manufacturer providing the of the excitation filter.

property.name: EmissionFilterWavelength
property.definition: The wavelength of the excitation filter.

property.name: EmissionFilterLowerBound
property.definition: The lower bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the emission filter.

property.name: EmissionFilterUpperBound
property.definition: The upper bound of of the wavelength transmitted by the excitation filter.

property.name: EmissionFilterRange
property.definition: The width of the transmitted wavelength range.

property.name: EmissionFilterPassbandTransmission
property.definition: The transmission in the passband. Given in %.

property.name: BeamsplitterType
property.definition: The type of beamsplitter used.

property.name: BeamsplitterModel
property.definition: The beam splitter model name.

property.name: BeamsplitterManufacturer
property.definition: The Manufacturer providing the beam splitter.

property.name: BeamsplitterWavelength
property.definition: The wavelength at which the beam splitter separates the beams.

property.name: Description
property.definition: A description of this hardware item.
